Do you ever use the checkbook that comes with opening the checking account? I didn't because 1) I didn't have checks at the time and 2) I lost that thing within the first week! I wanted something prettier for a good price, and this was it!

The package came in on time and it came with a cute Snaptotes cinch bag (orange, in the pics below)! I use the bag for my makeup brushes, so that's definitely a plus! The checkbook cover (not wallet) also comes with a removable plastic sleeve that can hold up to 6 photos/cards (I use it for pictures of my family and some nice movie stubs because I already have plenty of room in my actual wallet). It also has that duplicate check sleeve, but my checks already came with duplicates so I don't really need that part. It fits my checks perfectly and the feel of the material is smooth, soft, and very pretty. :) It's a beautiful teal color that looks amazing (slightly lighter and a bit more greenish teal than the picture on the site)! I haven't been able to get enough of this color!! It keeps my checks safe but I don't use it much because I don't usually use checks for anything other than rent. Still makes me feel like a slightly adultier adult, so there's that.

Could not recommend this enough! :)

reviewText:
honestly there were so many issues with the dress. First off, it's pictures as an olive green bottom and mine arrive in a lime green. If it wasn't for a color coordinated wedding I could have gotten over that part.

BUT the dress itself was made HORRIBLY. The stitching is awful. As you can see from my pictures there are loose stitches and the entire thing is completely lopsided. The top covers the entire right side of my chest and then the left is so far off it barely covers anything.

The back buttons were stiched incorrectly. The buttons themselves are supposed to be on one flap so you can adjust the tightness, but only one button is on the correct spot and the other two are on the same flap as the hole. (Also shown in pictures).

Lastly the pack is incredibly odd shaped. It's tight at the shoulders and near the waist it's opens up. Not form fitting at all. Overall a waste of a buy. Very dissatisfied with the effort that went in to making this.

I would have given this pouch a better review had it not been for a couple of not so small things. First, on my unit, the waist strap was sewn on incorrectly so that the strap has a permanent twist to it (like a twisted bra strap). In other words, the clasp was sewn on backwards so to wear this, you will have a permanent twist to the strap, which is very uncomfortable. Because of the twist, I couldn't really keep this on for an extended period of time because the twist irritated my skin. The fabric is quilted but also a little textured, which might also become an irritant. If you can wear it over a tee shirt or other undergarment, that would be optimal.

The one really nice thing about this belt is that it's a neutral color and it holds enough. It's really just meant for the important items you don't want pickpocketed while on a vacation. It has two individual pockets that are big enough to hold the essentials. And herein lies the second problem  the quilting. While the quilting makes this attractive, it adds considerable bulk underneath clothing. I'd rather have a little more room in the pockets for important items than bulky quilting bulging from under my clothing.

What I plan to do is to dissemble the strap and fix the twist and re-sew it back together. Then I'll just use it as a fanny pack type of thing for outdoor activities when I just need a pouch to hold my phone and keys and a credit card.

The idea for this is nice but the execution and price are a bit off.

I received a free or low-cost sample in exchange for my honest opinion. I do not automatically provide four or five star reviews when I receive a low- or no-cost item as is evidenced in my review history. I do not receive compensation for my reviews.

This money belt was offered to me for free. The following is my unbiased review after testing it out.

The first things I noted was that the fabric is soft, though it does have a texture to it. It is almost a bit rough, but it did not irritate my skin when left on for a six hour trial.

This money belt is a fairly straight forward affair. It is designed to be worn under clothes when traveling so that it is harder for someone to pick pocket you. By putting the contents of your wallet inside here, it is hard to swipe those items.

This has two pockets, I liked that, it meant that I could put my id, house key, and a credit card in the front pocket and my cash/passport in the back.

This is a bit too thick for hiding under clinging clothes, so be sure to wear a loose top or the outline of the pouch will show. You might also carry a small amount of cash in a pocket so that you are not having to use the money belt to access cash while standing in front of a cashier. (Thieves are always watchful!)

All in all, it is easy to adjust to fit my waist, easy to get on/off, I only sweated a minimal amount under it. The beige/nude color allows it to blend in under even light colored clothes.

Money belts used to be just for international travelers. That isn't the case now at all.

Depending on where we are going, this money belt is easy to wear under clothing and can help you keep your hands free. We have several little ones and when I am running errands with them I like to wear this belt.

It has 2 pockets and fits flat along your lower stomach. The tan color helps it blend in under your clothing. Using this allow me to keep my hands on my little ones and not have to worry about a purse. Super great for walks to the park or the pool.

Promotional or discounted product provided for review.
summary: Super great for walks to the park or the pool.

reviewText: Absolutely love it! I've used money belts for years and this is by far the best - incredibly comfortable

My sister wanted this because she and her husband travel and she felt that they should be using one on their trips,  Since she received it, she's been wearing it frequently close to home.

She loves it for putting on when she bikes or walks around the neighborhood.  She can wear it comfortably under her clothes (because of the soft material and the webbed design) or she can wear it as a waist pack on top of her clothes.  Either way, it's handier than carrying a purse and less conspicuous.  She even wears it to the grocery store,  She has her grocery list on her phone, so all she needs is her credit card and ID. The two compartments make it easy to organize and the zippers work just as they should.

She was particularly impressed with the fact that the belt is so comfortable and doesn't roll.  It also fits a wide range of waist sizes.  She's slim and it adjust to her waist, but it can be made big enough for her husband if they ARE traveling and he needs to wear it under his shirt.  It's such a neutral color that it doesn't show up, even under thin clothing.

***** I was given a free sample of this product.  The seller offered nothing but the sample and asked for nothing but an honest opinion.****  We think this is a great product.  It's a fine thing to have for a trip, but it's also useful on a daily basis.  No one in our family lives in what we consider a "high crime" area, but (sadly) crimes occur everywhere and purse-snatching is one of the most common crimes.  Usually it's an inconvenience, but sometimes it results in serious injury or even death.  Keeping your money and ID secreted on your body makes you much less of a target. It's worth thinking about.
summary: You don't have to travel far to be a target for a criminal

Other than that, I don't usually wear it for more than a few hours at a time. Not ideal for the 8-hour workday, but maybe the 3-4 hour night out. I usually have to take it off after about 4 hours, and that's after several weeks of training.
One more thing, If you're buying this to mask a weight problem like I was, don't let this be your solution. Let this be your motivation to look as good as or better than you do with it on. I see myself in this, and I know I can be that person someday without this. You can too!

It takes a while to get it on, so you may think it's too small but it's supposed to be like that. Like a bra, you're supposed to start on the least tightest and work your way to tightest as it gets less stretchy (and as you lose weight). If you can put it on easily on the first eye, you ordered too big. It's extra long in the front so I don't have fat sticking out on the bottom like regular corsets do when they're sucking me in. So I purchased My Very Tiny Waist as my first waist trainer. It was a good reasonable price and when I received it I LOVED IT. After 3 months of purchasing it I started to get a very sharp pain in my left back side as I wore it. I figured it was my posture so I corrected it. I was leaning far to the right and thought to myself. Holy crap my posture is way off. One day I noticed two cuts on my left side wondering where they came from only thing I could think of was the waist trainer. This is supposed to be a school backpack for a child. Which I am ok with. This makes trying to use the front pocket pretty much impossible. The two side pockets are still usable. It does not fit all of my things unless I take out the Weight Watchers. Doing that prevents me from using it as a purse. I wouldn't recommend this for a child who has a lot of school supplies to carry around with them each day. I also would not recommend this as a mini backpack purse for women who have a lot of items to carry. reviewText:
I ordered this for my Lara Croft Halloween costume. Shipping said it could take two to three weeks but it arrived in like, four days. Problem was, they gave me two of the same holsters, instead of one right and one left! I emailed the seller and they responded very quickly and got the replacement shipped out. Then I tried the thing on and realized I'd TOLD HER THE WRONG ONE. Like an idiot. So I sent another email, so sorry, I actually need a LEFT one - and without any questions she sent another replacement part. I offered to ship the one she sent before back, but she didn't mind. And all of this in time for Halloween! Holy customer service, Batman!

Now the quality - the reproduction is good but the material is SERIOUSLY stiff. I recommend wetting it down with alcohol and spending 30 min twisting, scrunching, kneading etc. to make it move with you when you wear it. Also, make sure to stretch the holsters width-wise so you can pull your "guns" out quickly and actually get them back in without looking. Sells the costume much better. Lastly, the buckle was too shiny for my taste, so I sanded it a bit and dotted in some grey paint with a sponge to make it look more worn.

One note on sizing - I'm tiny (5'2") and 115lbs. The distance from belt to thigh wasn't bad, and the belt wasn't too long for me, but the straps around the thighs were almost too small for me! And I'm, like I said, TINY. So you may need to size up.

Overall, turned out great. Even won my office costume contest!
summary: OK quality, but great customer service and fast delivery!

This is a great drape sweater poncho!  The fit is roomy & flowy, and the neck is just large enough to hang - not tight like a turtle neck.  You can spin it around how you like, since there are no arm holes, and wear it either with the V shape in the front to cover your crotch area, or as shown in the photo with the inverted V so the poncho drapes on your thighs.  It is super comfortable, and surprisingly soft - I had expected the material to be a bit scratchy, but it's not.  I did deduct one star because people kept following me around with scissors to cut off the strings that kept appearing out of nowhere from the shaggy tassel ends.  For some reason they were getting longer & longer as the day went on, so I don't expect this poncho to withstand the washing machine or dryer.  I will probably have it dry cleaned to get me through the next couple of winters.  But I am happy with this purchase.  Great fall sweater for when it's not quite that cold (wear a tank or T shirt underneath) or in the winter with long sleeves.
summary: Nice poncho sweater, looks JUST like the image.

reviewText: This beautiful draped cloak is made of nice material and light weight. The picture is very accurate to what you get and it seems very well made.  The only thing I would say is that I would make sure to handwash and line dry this item, as I think it might be just a little too sensitive to going through a regular wash cycle. My husband and I love to travel so we booked a quick trip to Paris. A friend suggested doing our maternity photos while there and we thought it was brilliant, but what dress could we wear that was still affordable? This dress was it! Fast forward two weeks- what can you feel beautiful in while pregnant as the pregnant matron of honor in a wedding? This dress! Here are a few tid bits 1) I'm curvy. 5'6 225 pounds at 28 weeks. I have boobs and a butt but normal arms and waist. I purchased a large. This dress fit perfectly, doesn't pull in on my DD's And open in enough time to fit the hips. It's seam is sewed in so it made it a tad snug to zip since your chest expands during pregnancy but once zipped, it was great.
2) the lace sleeves and fabric was beautiful. Not cheap feeling at all 3) I've literally had so many friends ask me where I got this dress and I love telling them Amazon. 4) it photographs well and is not as hot as it looks. It's a thin material underneath so there is great airflow.
summary: Get this dress! Perfect pregnant photo shoot or wedding dress

I received my 3 pairs of stone plugs (Sodalite, Hematite, and White Jade) really fast. First of all, the sodalite plugs are GORGEOUS!!!!!! The picture does not do them justice. They're the black/blue ones in the photo and they're actually a lighter blue with some white/tan streaks, there is no black in them. There are color variations which is to be expected and personally, I think that just makes them more beautiful. The hematite and white jade also look GREAT.

I wear 7/16" and the Mystic Metal stone plugs appear to be just a tiny smidge smaller than these other 7/16" stone plugs I own, but the sizing was really close. Overall, I am really happy with them and I will be ordering from Mystic Metals again in the future. I highly recommend them!

UPDATE Oct 2017: I recently started wearing my sodalite plugs again, I didn't wear them too much because they're just a smidge smaller than my other plugs but they usually do stay in. Today, one fell out and chipped  I scraped at the chip with my nail and it just crumbled more pieces right off. Sadly I will be no longer wearing the sodalite plugs. I think Ive only worn these one for a total of like, 7 days since I got em?

Also, my white jade plugs has drastically discolored. It happened shortly after I got em and like the sodalite plugs, I didn't wear them too often. One is more white while the other is clear. It bothers me a little but at least these ones aren't chipped.

reviewText: I have a great suspicion that these are counterfeits.  My child wore them for one week before they stitches started unraveling, the decorative glitter started wearing off the straps, and the soles started degrading.  I went to a local shoe store to compare another set of Skechers with this one I bought on Amazon.  The  store's shoes were much better quality, from heft to craftsmanship.  This is not the first pair of counterfeit shoes I've gotten off Amazon (the others were supposed to be Saucony).  It is a shame that the site is allowing counterfeits to be sold. I won't be purchasing stuff like this from Amazon anymore.

What could be better than ordering sneakers online and having them at your door the next day?
  The sneakers were a perfect fit, excellent product, exactly like the picture.
It's hard to review something so quick. Easy and satisfying.  I am DONE going shopping for shoes.  Every shoe or sneaker I have ever ordered from Amazon has been on the money.  You just can't go wrong.

The shoes are great. The problem is they sent the wrong size. I didn't realize it until past the return deadline because the box said 5. But when my daughter started wearing them, after a few weeks, they were too small. I looked at the shoe and it said 4. I tried to return them, but they said the return window had closed.

Honestly, I wasn't happy that prior order 'Girls Sneakers-Gray Joggers' was LOST in transit..esp, when its part of Birthday gift for my daughter. Furious, I blasted Amazon Cust Rep - they duly apologized plus offered me to pick ANY shoe (yes ANY) to make up for my girl's grief.
Daughter agreed on this 'Skechers Kids Swirly Girl' shoe - (although double price) and voila - Amazon ships it to me the NEXT day - at ZERO extra cost.
Shoe arrived only to sparkle a 70 mm smile on her face..wears it every day to school.. Nice comforting..Perfect fit size.. Colors are bright & pretty.
I'd recommend it... and why not after AMAZON's soothing way of apology... THANKS AMAZON !! :)
summary: Daughter loves it... Happy Birthday girl!

I love shopping for new clothes.  I came across this top and it looked like a great shirt for work so I decided to purchase it.  I am 55 and weigh about 130lbs so I ordered an x-small in mocha.  The top is made in China of 95% Rayon and 5% Spandex.  The material is very soft and the quality is great.  The top is a much deeper brown than it looked on the screen.  I like the color, I was just hoping for a lighter brown.  The shirt fits very similar to the picture.  There is faux leather trim around the collar and hole cut-outs in the front and back.  For a night out I can get away with not wearing something underneath, but to wear this shirt to work I would need to wear a layering cami underneath.  I am really happy with this top.
I was given the opportunity to purchase this item at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I have picked up a couple "keyhole" neckline tops over the last season or two and find that the style can be flattering on me. I'm tall, generally curvy and particularly busty. I am 5'9" and tend to wear a US 16 (sometimes 18) and 38GG-H for reference. A little skin breaks up the expanse of fabric spread across the chest and disrupts what could otherwise be a totally matronly dumpy shape. I ordered this in an XXL.

Products from this brand seem to vary wildly in reviews, and I feel like I hit the jackpot with this top. The sleeves are nice and long, the keyhole neckline hints at cleavage without really exposing much. It's a very interesting neckline-- skip all necklaces with it. The longer length and drape in front work really well. I wear it with slimmer cut jeans tucked into boots. If you were just a couple inches shorter, it would be a nice tunic length to wear over leggings. I think I'll get another color, I like it so much.
summary: Super flattering top that works well if you are tall, curvy, or both.

Though I will say this was the first time I ordered a pair online without trying them on first, so I was nervous. But this turned out to be a great choice. Breathable, lightweight but sturdy, and comfortable during all my workouts. The built-in arch support is great and I've had no discomfort after 2 weeks of use. As far as the sole thickness and cushioning goes, I would consider these a 'medium' build (not thin, not overly thick) so if you're into heavy running outdoors then take that into consideration. Everyone is different in their preference for cushioning, but I think for light runs on a treadmill they would be sufficient. Love these, highly recommend!

reviewText: On the left shoe, there were two stained yellow spots.

I love these, I had the previous iteration (or maybe two earlier?) and finally wore them out after several years. They are definitely a light-weight training shoe so I wouldn't get them if you are going to be doing a lot of running. But this also makes them extremely comfortable, I hadn't realized how hot running shoes made my feet until I switched to these. Good support and my feet stay cool all day, also noticeably light but well-made and long lasting.

I have worn them hiking in a pinch but don't really recommend it because the material is mesh-like and will let a lot of dirt in. But if you mainly take cardio classes and/or do weight training or just need something to wear around town look no further.

Super light-weight, decent arch support (mine is higher than average).  I was pleasantly surprised by the sole/tread on these for my circuit training classes, as I couldn't really tell by online pics.  Also pleasantly surprised that these ran ever so slightly bigger than Nike running shoes I use to wear 15+years ago - I always wore one to 1.5 sizes larger in their "Hurache's"/running shoes, so I was really worried my size 6 would be too small - there is actually more toe room in these shoes than any other size 6 shoe I own (athletic, heel, boot).  But it is the correct amount of room from big toe to edge of shoe for me (an inch or less, I don't want my big toe being jammed into edge of shoe when lunging, jumping, etc.).  Shoes arrived with an odd yellowish color on side of one shoe, but no damage to box, paper lining etc - I was happy that a clorox wipe easily cleaned the shoe and did not discolor any further.  I am very happy and highly recommend, although I have only worked out it once!
summary: Super light-weight, nice tread and arch support - love them so far!

Favorite training and walking-around sneakers.
They look good with just about anything, and are comfortable for most situations.
With the exception of running (for which I use proper Mizuno running sneakers with an arch-support insole), these sneakers are my go-to.
If I could, I'd take away a 1/2 star for arch support - I have a slightly wider front of the foot and arches that are a little on the high side, so I do look for a good under the foot fit. I could probably tie the laces differently or put in an insole(they're pretty expensive), but as is, when I did a zumba class in these, my arch began to twinge :(
However, this is overall an awesome shoe that I will continue to stick with for going out, day to day walking, and for training and gym use (with the exception of running and zumba (although hip-hop was fine). The shoes have a great flexibility to them and don't look "dirty" easily. My previous pair of flex supreme TR 3s have lasted for a good 2 years and are just now on the verge of being worn out. This is the optimal sneaker that is flexible in more ways than one: from pointing you toes to leg-pressing, from gym use to shopping to adding a sporty edge to a dressy night out, the flex has it all.

Average of 8 miles a week and then sprints twice a week on a treadmill. Just after running with these 3 times, I am having major back issues that I have never had before.

MY STATS and other shoes:
I road and trail run. I run on my tip toes on the treadmill and a lot of heal on the road. I am 5'6 169lbs with more muscle than an average runner. Built more like a sprinter than a marathon runner.
I LOVE Nike FLEX bottoms. They really give me support and flex needed. I have also used Asics and Puma.
summary: Hurt my knees and back running

Highly recommended for walking/running on concrete or tracks. As long as nike continues to make the flex supreme, they will get my money. Please don't change this shoe!

I am a recess aide and on my feet all day long. I tried these shoes on in the store before purchasing them on Amazon. They are very lightweight and comfortable. I was surprised how great they felt. I haven't had a pair of Nikes since Nike shoxs came out. They are so much more lightweight than those. I wore them an entire day the first day and had no problems. The second day; however, I got a pain in my hip to the point where I started limping. As soon as I got home and took them off, the pain was gone the rest of the evening. I'm only 30 by the way. Nothing else in my daily routine changed except wearing these shoes two days in a row. I don't understand why it would make my hip hurt since they are comfortable on my feet, but I'm sure that was the problem. I wore different shoes today and had no pain. I don't think as much as I am on my feet I will be able to wear them an extended amount of time. I will have to rotate wearing them every other day. For normal wear, I believe, people will be fine. I am literally walking or standing six hours a day straight.

**UPDATE: So, initially after wearing them, I had hip pain after wearing them. I don't know if they just needed to be broken in, but I wear them all the time now and have not experienced any pain since the first couple times of wearing them. They are comfortable, and I love them even more now.

The inside lining has a velvet like texture. Overall, I would recommend these to anyone who is looking for a great fitting and comfortable pair of gloves to wear to work or casually.  As a reference point, I wear primarily business casual to work.

reviewText: great gloves nice tight fit, warm, and flexible
Warm and very professional
These were purchased for my sons. They both loved them.

I like these gloves.  Very comfortable with excellent mobility while still being warm and looking good.  I received these at a greatly reduced price for the purpose of reviewing and I am happy with them.  The sizing feels about right.  There is a nice knit cuff to keep wrists warm and the lining is some sort of soft imitation fur to keep things cozy.  The styling with the white contrasting stitching isn't really to my liking but that's just a matter of taste so I can't really deduct a star for that.

I have seen an endless number of gloves that come with the promise of being touch screen friendly but very very few actually keep that promise.  These actually have some ability to communicate with your cell phone.  I was able to do a little bit of swiping but mostly I was able to press things with whatever bonus material they put on the index finger.  Unbelievable.  Now don't go thinking that you are going to carry out all of your phone functions with these gloves on because that's just not going to happen, but in a pinch you can answer your phone or check your facebook if you happen to have a status update emergency that needs checking before you can get indoors where it will  be warm enough to remove your gloves.

BOTTOM LINE:  Good gloves.  They come nicely boxed so would make a lovely (albeit cliche) gift for the cold handed man in your life.  They should be plenty warm for driving and with good dexterity I think they would be well suited to that task.
summary: Very nice and warm driving gloves with some limited touch screen capabilities

There wasn't quite enough room for my chest to fit comfortably without the little empire-waist band riding up a little, which is why I gave it a "somewhat small" rating, but otherwise it was comfortable and lovely!  Would buy again!

reviewText:
I just got these glasses today and they are already my favorite pair. I am a loyal Oakley customer but these woodies are pretty close at a fraction of the price. They came in an awesome semi hard case which is worth purchasing on its own in my opinion. Included in the case was a guitar pick and a lens cloth which are both awesome. The glasses fit on my face perfectly and don't slide down with head movement. The lenses  also don't fog up like the cheaper glasses. The glasses are made out of quality materials and are very sturdy. The wood feature is really cool and has a nice finish to it. I would recommend these to a friend and will definitely be purchasing some more for Christmas presents. Highly recommended.
I received this product at a discounted price for my honest review.

I was so sad when I lost my Ray Ban Wayfarers. They were limited edition and way too expensive to replace. Cut to Woodies sunglasses! These are a great style and also very unique! I love the mix of the wood with the plastic frames. These are comfortable to wear and the polarized lenses are fantastic for my sensitive eyes. The lenses are super dark which is great for me as I can barely even see on a cloudy day.

I love that these came with a case, cleaning cloth, bracelet, and guitar pic. The case is really sturdy and nice and I love the zip closure. The extra goodies in the package was a really great surprise. I got these in white, but I would love to see them in other bright colors like green, turquoise, or purple.

Overall, I am really satisfied with these sunglasses. Great value and lots of extras makes me a happy buyer! I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. The opinions expressed here are entirely my own and I will happily purchase these sunglasses in the future!
summary: Dark lenses and lots of extras!

reviewText: I purchased the Woodies Bamboo Wood sunglasses  as a gift for my teenage granddaughter. She really like them because they were different and unique due to  the wooden sides. It is really hard to find a gift for a teenager and these sunglasses did the trick. I received these sunglasses at a discount in exchange for an honest review.

reviewText:
I purchased these sunglasses at a discount to review. They aren't my usual style although ilove the wooden detail!

I wore them out today and actually quite enjoyed them! I often put my sunglasses on my head when I go indoors and they act as a headband. Because of the style and design when I put them back over my eyes they do not get caught in my hair! That's a huge peeve I have about certain sunglasses.

The sunglasses come in a super nice case that actually you can clip onto a bag or backpack or something.

 Also comes with a rubber bracelet that says "woodies" and features an American flag.

When you unzip the case you will find a cleaning cloth and a guitar pick!
 The little additions are fun. I'm giving the pick to my husband and the cloth is of course good for cleaning, but I  will not use the bracelet. Sorry!!

I'm pleasantly surprised how much I like these glasses and I'm very pleased with the case that they come in too!

How can you not love these stylist sunglasses?  These glasses were made with extra care, I can tell.  The company ships with extra care also.  Sunglasses are put inside a plastic bag and then ship in this beautiful sunglasses case that is also padded.  Inside the case there is beautiful designed rag to clean your glasses.  I would strongly suggest buying these awesome glasses for the holidays, it will make an excellent gift.

I desperately needed sunglasses and I love all things bamboo so I ordered these. First off, I open the package to find a beautiful hard case with a clip attached to it for convenience in attaching to a purse, backpack, hook - you name it. Awesome! Wrapped around this amazing case is a promotional, rubber bracelet. I'm thinking that's cool, take it off of the case, and there's an American flag on it, coolness factor now at a 10 and I haven't even seen the sunglasses yet! Open the case to fine the sunglasses, a fantastic lens cleaning cloth with a cool pic on it, & get this, a Guitar pick!! I'm in love.

I try on the sunglasses and they're great. They look cool and I feel cool in them. They feel sturdy unlike all the plastic sunglasses I generally invest in. The arms have springs in them which is a huge plus in my book.

What's not to love about these sunglasses and this brand???? Would definitely recommend again & again regardless of getting them at discount.

This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review." i

The backside of the charm is stamped "925" and "Silver Phantom." There is a 3 inch extender on the end of the necklace for wearing at different lengths. I prefer the shorter length but could see the benefit in the extender for other wearers. Besides the aesthetic, my favorite part of the necklace is that the charm is anchored to the chain on each side. There is nothing worse than the lobster claw clasp wiggling itself down to the same side as the charm, but that is not an issue with this necklace. I would definitely recommend this necklace to others.

reviewText:
As with ALL of the several jewelry pieces I have gotten from Silver Phantom Jewelry, I am once again in love!

This heartbeat necklace is great.  The quality and design stole my heart!!

The necklace arrived in a pretty, dark blue, velvet bag, as all of my jewelry from Phantom has.  It's great for storage.

reviewText:
I wasn't overly impressed with this.  It wasn't horrible (both my husband and daughter liked it on me) but I didn't like it.  First, the one I got, the ties weren't woven through the crocheted part evenly so the ties were about an inch off in distance where they came together in the front.  I did like how you can tighten/loosen the ties to give a custom look.  I am not big on "ties" on my suits and such - simply too messy if sand gets in them and the parts dangling get caught up on everything.

The material is very sheer and lightweight - which I like for a cover-up.  I am very short so this was longer on me than I would prefer (just above my knee) and looked like a sheer dress instead of a cover up (IMO).  I normally wear a 34D, size 2 pants and it had plenty of room all the way around.  For a one size fits most, it definitely would work for a wide variety of body types.  If there wasn't another one I liked better, I probably would be keeping this.

reviewText: Beautiful
The necklace looks great! The chain is thin, but fits with the overall look. I'm excited to give this as a gift!

My girlfriend told me, "I'll try anything that has to do with coffee." (In reply, I joked about the idea of rubbing coffee all over myself haha!) So for her early 25th birthday present, I bought her this caffeine molecule necklace. And its perfect!

What a smart idea! I never imagined how coffee could be incorporated into jewelry design. This is a conversation piece. She wears it around the office and got comments on it. More like questions, like, what is that? A turtle? She got laughs all around. And yes the pendant is small enough to be non-obtrusive so it can be worn around the office or with other casual clothing. The chain struck me as rather thin. Chains like this are very popular with ladies because it is more effeminate. The nice thing about this particular chain is that the caffeine pendant is quite small, so the thin chain matches it well and does not overshadow it. The not so good thing about thin chains though, is that they are very prone to being tangled and it is crazy difficult to untangle. The other thing is that the spring clasp is pretty small and it is difficult to put it on or take it off. That's not the fault of this seller, but the nature of this kind of chain. But I want to make sure people are aware of it.

I found out that Silver Phantom Jewelry (the seller) is not the only company selling this caffeine molecule necklace. However, the ones that are cheaper than this one are not sterling silver, and the other sterling silver ones are more expensive than this one. So this is in the sweet spot - precious metal at the lowest price! I strongly prefer the rhodium plating that this item has, because sterling silver seems to always tarnish after the girlfriend has worn it for a short time.

Lastly, I want to point out that even though this pendant likes sort of spiky, the ends are all rounded off and are not stabby, nor does it cause any discomfort. If there is one thing I wish they would improve on, it would be to find a way to place a gemstone in the hexagon in the center, which would dramatically improve the visual appeal of the pendant. (Silver Phantom Jewelry, are you listening?)

reviewText: Good quality, cute necklace!

The silver one hasn't broken yet. The clasp is a different style from that of the rose gold. The silver has the lobster claw clasp; the rose gold uses the springring. Not sure why they designed it differently.

Apart from the clasp problem (which I hope is an isolated incident), the necklaces are great. They're shiny, beautiful, and smooth. Very eyecatching. A good length. Feels nice. Shame with the clasp.

reviewText:
When I first saw this necklace I had to have it being the coffee guzzling nerd that I am. When it came in the mail I was concerned about how short and thin the chain was, but after wearing it, I realized it was good quality. It has a nice shine to it and reflects light at different angles, which makes it look like I paid at least $30 bucks for it.  I've even slept with it on without any problems of the chain breaking or getting snagged in my hair. Excellent!  Lengthwise, it looks pretty classy with my v-neck and scoopneck shirts, also when paired with a nice dress. It could also be accessorized with a polo shirt and pocket protector to really get that geek vibe flowing!  Heck yes. I wouldn't recommend wearing it with a t-shirt as it probably wouldn't show above the collar, or if you have an unusually massive neck, like Bigfoot, I doubt it would fit. I received this product at a discount for my honest review, and I think this is a high quality necklace that will last and be cherished for all eternity.

Side note - So far nobody has commented or asked me questions about this necklace when I'm wearing it, even my own family. My hypothesis is that they are assuming it looks like a sideways person or maybe even a constellation of a turtle, but most likely it's because I'm surrounded by boring people who just don't care... Pfff!
summary: The perfect way to represent my daily drug of choice!

reviewText:
I love this necklace.  It's a funny thing, but I had seen people with tattoos of the caffeine molecule before, and I thought it was pretty cool.  Then about two weeks ago, I saw a woman on the subway wearing a necklace like this and wondered where I could get one.  Then, about a week ago, I joined a review site, and saw this necklace listed as one of the available items.*

The necklace is beautiful.  The chain is quite thin and delicate, but the design/pendant part is substantial.  Although it's small you can really see the design. It's sterling silver, not crummy pot metal.

The necklace comes in a little pouch, which would make for a nice presentation if you gave it as a gift.  It would be a thoughtful gift for a caffeine and jewelry loving person.

I have two criticisms of  this necklace.  The chain can get very tangled around the central part, and the necklace was too short for me.  If you have a large/fat neck, you may need to do as I do and use a necklace extender with it.

Overall, though, this was a great purchase.

* This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.  However, I would like this necklace even if I'd paid full price for it.

reviewText:
Wore these money belts for about two weeks overseas.
Pros: Easy to conceal, handle
Holds a surprisingly good amount of money, cards & documents without giving you the feeling of being weighed down
The belt tightener, while simple, is easy to operate and effective

Cons:
The zipper tag ends became loose after a few uses (either quality was poor or they were caught in the other zipper and tore loose) so I had to cut off the loose ends and cauterize the threads. After that they worked well.
When wearing during a hot, warm or humid climate, the belts will restrict air flow between two areas of the body and make you hot and sweaty very quickly. I had to take off my belt in such instances and put it in my bag.

Before finding these money belts, I tried three other money belts that had to be returned because they were scratchy or flimsy or the buckle seemed weak.  Other than a $30 silk one I found, this was my favorite.  It seems very durable, the buckle is quite substantial and the belt is very soft and stretchy.  The zippers move nicely.  I was actually worried it would seem bulky when on but, surprisingly, it didn't...even with a passport and my iphone 6 in it.  I tried it on low on my waist with the bottom half stuck down inside my jeans and it was quite comfortable. My teen daughters don't like it as much as the silk one, but I think it is just as comfortable on me and a great price as a 2 pack.  I know you are, in theory, supposed to use these hidden under your clothes.  If you use it to take money in and out during the day, a thief could see it.  However, the odds of that seem slim to me so I intend to use it like a purse or fanny pack and hold money, credit cards, metro card, other tickets and phone.  If I wear a jacket, I will just keep it over my shirt and under my jacket. It would still protect you from pick pockets when I go to London and Paris, which are more likely than a mugging.  I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this to anyone.
summary: this was my favorite. It seems very durable

reviewText: So excited to use these on our trip coming up!

APPEARANCE:  The product is black and appears to be constructed in a way that is both fashionable and heavy-duty to withstand repeatable use. The logo is prominent but tasteful. Zippers appear well constructed and easy to use.

USE:  The product has a large zippered pocket and a medium zippered pocket as well as mesh backing that has a pocket. I put my passport and Galaxy S7 in its phone case in the medium zippered pocket and they both easily fit. The large zippered pocket has 3 credit card pockets which will hold multiple credit cards per pocket if need be. The elastic band and mesh backing are comfortable to wear under a shirt directly against the skin if you prefer to conceal the product while traveling. I have not yet used it outside during a hot day so can't speak to the "sweat factor" yet.
Works as advertised. Size is a bit small.

I had been looking at these belts to hold a passport for awhile.  We like to go on cruises and some of the countries we visit are in some pretty undeveloped countries with great scenery and nice beaches.  Many times there are peddlers of goods that hound you.  I wanted one of these wallets to wear under our clothing so I could keep more cash on me but not have it be obvious when I look into my wallet to bargain with vendors.  If vendors see $ on you they are not as willing to come down on price.  If you show them all I have is x dollars they usually will accept it.  So this is perfect.  I can have the money I need and keep it concealed.  Safety is also a concern so you don't want to show to much money as you can be a target for robbery.  When we go ashore I take our passports with us.  Do not want to have an issue reboarding the ship and the passport is the best form of ID.  Plus we need to carry credit cards on us.  That is all of our most valuable forms of identification on me.  Having the bag guard against losing our credit card and passport information through electronic theft is a real bonus.  Love that these have credit card holding pockets in the zippered pocket closest to your skin.  You also have a small outside pocket for other items.  It keeps them tucked away from the other items in the pocket.  The sizes of the two pockets are good size to put bills in without the need to fold them.  I do plan to wear this under my clothing.  It is super comfortable and light weight.  Wish I could say I was at ideal weight but nope not there.  This is still comfortable as it has a elastic belt to it that is adjustable.  The belt is soft without sharp edges.  I love the fact that the clasp rests against the front of the fabric not rubbing against skin.  The back of the wallet has a soft weave type of material which feels very comfortable.  It stays in place and doesn't move even when using the rest room. My only regret is I didn't get it sooner. They also warranty the item for a year and seem willing to make any issues right.  That is a real bonus. I do not hesitate to recommend this product.  I have looked at them for a while and the price is great for a wallet with so many great features. I am not an Amazon company affiliate. I am an Amazon Prime customer that enjoys writing reviews as a hobby. I received this product at a promotional price or free. If my review has helped you, please thumbs up so I can continue to provide helpful information for your purchasing. If you have any questions or comments, please comment or message and I will be glad to help!
summary: Great quality item.  Litghtweight and easy to adjust for a comfortable fit.  Love the credit card slots.

reviewText:
I have bought three sweaters from Lief Nelson and all have been exemplary in their quality and accuracy with pictures.  This sweater is no different.  I ordered the 'brown' which sports a (beautiful) brown / blue weave and beige zipper area and shoulder / breast patch.  These two areas, zipper length and shoulder / breast, are suede (looks like a more plastic material in pictures) and I was happily surprised.  Sleeves come out to the wrist, not up over the hand.  Very, very warm.  The fit is somewhat small from my experience...I am 6'7", 255 lb, 52" chest, 38" waist and usually wear XLT sweaters...ordered XXL here and the fit is perfect.  It does come down low on the hips and stays tight all the way.  Pockets seem to be of good material, but with this fitting fairly tight, objects in your pocket would look out of place in my opinion.  Zipper is a very good, strong, durable zipper.

I only have two complaints, both very trivial that, if known beforehand, would not have affected my buying this sweater.  The hood is small, fits a bit tighter than I expected when worn over my head (material on the inside is nice and warm, however).  The other very minor thing, the zippers (1 main zipper, one per pocket) are a bit tacky as they say "Fashion" on them.  There is a mechanism to switch out zipper handles so this is really a non-issue.

Excellent sweater, excellent quality, nice and warm, very comfortable.  Highly recommend!

I am 6'2", 200 lbs, size 33 - 34 waist, ~44" chest, slim build, athletic cut, no gut.  This sweater has a very comfortably snug, slim fit.  It's appearance affords a look somewhere between masculine and very sexy, depending on how you wear it and where you wear it.  Don't buy it if you have a gut; it will pronounce your gut.  It highlights everything about your core, whether good or bad.  If you have a decent core, body shape, you will rock this sweater and knock 'em dead.  Seriously.  If you have a gut, you simply will not rock or knock anything.  This is sweater will not turn you into superman, but you will feel like one.  If you put a half way decent body in it, it will reward you, hands down.  You will find these comments replicated in other sweaters from this line.  I copy paste them only where they truly apply, so don't think anything fishy is going on.  This sweater, and several others I have from this line, are exactly what this write-up says.  No lies, no misleading, just the honest to goodness truth.  This sweater, and the others for which I have pasted these exact review comments, are more than deserving of every word written herein.  Belive that!  Thanks Anna and Ira of Leif Nelson.  Yourselves, the brothers/designers, and the loomers are gold.  True Gold.
summary: This sweater has a very comfortably snug, slim fit

reviewText:
First thing to take notice is that you do get 110 pieces or 55 pairs of jewelry piercings, all of different designs. You will not get any duplicates as shown in the stock photo in the product description, you do get some different color variants but aside from that not one pair is the same.

The quality is pretty decent seeing that it's a variety pack. The only problem is that it's very small and easy to lose, also it's hard to match together if you do not own a your own organizational jewelry box and have them bunched up in the zip lock bag it came with.

Having 55 types to choose from is nice especially if you like to switch it up everyday instead of sticking to one piercing all the time.

Overall good set of body jewelry, keep in mind that they may be on the small side and may be easy to lose if you don't have an organizational tool to store them in.

reviewText: Great

***I received this complimentary item in exchange for my honest & unbiased review, which is exactly what I will provide***
I own at least a dozen or so watches that I alternate depending upon activity, attire, and occasion.  I do my own regular watch maintenance including battery changes and band adjustments.  Working on watches is always a case where having the right tool for the job is essential.  This simple but effective tool is great for removing the pins that hold watch band links together.  The pins are typically very small and very firmly set.  To use this, simply place the watch band on the base, align the pin punch screw press with the pin hole (adjusting for the height of the watch band by using the adjustment dial set into the base), then dial in the pin punch press.  The pin can then be easily removed.  Replacement works the same way, only using the second press which has a flat surface to push the pin back in.
This tool is nice and solid with precision fit parts, works very well, and comes with 2 extra pin press attachments.  I am very satisfied with it, and highly recommend it if you need to or anticipate needing to work on a watch band.
summary: Makes Watch Band Adjustments & Repairs a Breeze

reviewText: I received a complimentary sample of this in exchange for a fair review. For many years, I used a punch pin I made myself to knock out watchband pins. This device makes the process much easier and secure. One side pushes the pin out, and the other side pushes it in. I was very impressed by the workmanship of this. It is made of tool steel to excellent tolerances. It is a precision instrument. It comes with two extra pins. If you frequently have to adjust watchbands, this device will soon become your friend!
The link pin remover worked just as advertised.  I was able to remove the links from my stainless steel watchband, and am glad I purchased it.
summary: and am glad I purchased it

My spouse loves watches, and has quite the large collection. However, not all watch bands are comfortable to wear as they are out of the box, so to speak. Usually, getting a watch band size involves a trip to the jewelry store or kiosk, or trying to jerry rig something at home. Not anymore!

The BABAN Metal Watch Band Holder Link Pin Remover Base Strap Bracelet Adjust Repair Tool makes it a lot easier to accomplish at home. In the interest of full disclosure, I happen to know someone who works at one of those jewelry kiosks, so I asked for some assistance with figuring this tool out. My helper does advise watching a video on the Tube to help figure out how to size your watch. I was fortunate to have hands-on help.

The BABAN Metal Watch Band Holder Link Pin Remover Base Strap Bracelet Adjust Repair Tool essentially pushes the pins out of watch links, and then pushes them back in again to set the link in place.

How to use:
- unscrew the knob with the pin pusher needle, until it is wide enough to fit your watchband
- if necessary, adjust the height of your watchband so it lines up with the pin pusher needed by using the disks in the base of the tool
- line the pin up with the pin pusher needle > this is also the side with the slit in the side to allow the pin to be pushed through
- secure the band in place with the flat arm
- slowly twist the knob until the pin slowly pushes out the other side
- remove the watch from the sizer
- pull the pin from the link with pliers (not included)
- rinse and repeat, as needed
- to put pins in place, set watch back in the sizer
- place the pin to be pushed back in place in front of the flat arm

Pros:
- metal > will last longer than plastic
- includes two (2) replacement pins
- easy to use

Cons:
- ZERO instructions
- pliers to pull pins are not included
- takes a bit longer than using hammering tools
- may not fit wide band watches

With my helpers assistance, I am confident I can size my watch or any watch added to the spouses growing collection. I rated this product four (4) stars because it did not include instructions, and it did not include pliers to remove the pins. I received this product for free in exchange for an honest, unbiased review. All opinions expressed herein are my own, with some advice from my helper.

I got this watch band link and pin remover because I had a watch Ive wanted to make smaller. This is a nice, solid tool. Its exactly what I was looking for. You can pay that and then have this forever and work on your watches whenever you need to (it will save you money in the long run). This device makes the process easy. Basically, one side pushes the pin out and the other side pushes the pin in. Id suggest watching some YouTube videos first on how to remove watch links. It helped me out. I received this product complimentary in exchange for my genuine review.
summary: decent tool to remove watch links. Will save me money in the long run.

These Women Lace Top Thigh High Stockings are a lot more comfortable than I expected them to be. I prefer knee high and thigh high stockings instead of full pantyhose but the ones I've used before are very thin and don't last very long as they get a run pretty quickly. These stockings on the other hand are thicker which actually makes them smoother as well. The lace for the thighs are very pretty and have silicone around them to keep them from rolling down. The silicone really does keep them in place even on a bigger women like myself. I love that you get 2 pairs instead of just one. These also come in a cute zip bag so you can store them safely to keep them from getting damaged. I would definitely recommend these Women Lace Top Thigh High Stockings!

**I received a discount on this product for testing and reviewing purposes and this is my honest and unbiased opinion**

reviewText:
Omg. I love this dress already. I bought it in navy to wear to a wedding coming up soon. I tried it on as SOON as I got it, and it fit PERFECTLY. I'm 5'4 190lbs, 38F and opted for the XXL. Its ALMOST too big, but I'd rather it this way than too small for SURE. I'm an alright seamstress, so will tailor a couple of things (the "collar" around the "neckline" is a bit finnicky, so i'll tack that done, and maybe tighten up the shoulders a bit), but other than that, its PERFECT. Since I'm not that tall, its maybe a TOUCH long, but, I bought this crinoline (https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01EKUU0TG/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s01?ie=UTF8&psc=1) in gray to go under it, and its JUST perfect. It puffs the skirt out just enough for the dress to fall right under my knee. Its about an inch longer without the crinoline. Since I'm wearing it to a wedding where I WILL be dancing around like a madman, I personally wouldn't want it any shorter, because I'd be a bit nervous/self-conscious about the possibility of the skirt flipping up a bit...

The fabric is a nice quality, a decent weight, light and stretchy enough to be comfortable in, but heavy enough to kinda pull in the waist, and really keep the lines of the dress crisp.

I want this dress in EVERY color now. It is seriously SUCH a winner.

reviewText:
I'm quite happy with these! Love the variety of colors and it's nice that there are two of each in case you lose one or you have both nostrils pierced. I ordered these just to switch up my usual clear jewel nose stud so I haven't left them in for extend periods of time like other users and therefore haven't noticed any flaking or fading of the colored coatings. They can be a bit entertaining to put in because you do have to go from inside your nose out, but I've noticed that if I just put my finger on the outside of the piercing hole, the ring usually finds its way through pretty easily. Other reviewers mentioned that they feel this rings are a larger size than a traditional piercing however I didn't experience any noticeable discomfort when I put the ring in, though my nose was every so slightly sore by the end of the day so it could be from a size difference or just the fact that I had a round ring in a straight hole :)

My only (slight) complaint with these is that the ring ends right at the inside edge of my nostril so most folks who are shorter than I am (which at 5'10" is a fair amount of people) can see the end of the ring if they care to pay close enough attention. I found that because of this, it was a bit easier to accidentally push the ring out a little if I rubbed my nose and actually got it caught on my sweatshirt at one point when I tried to take it off. But, I figure with all you're getting, it's well worth the price! (Pardon my glaring facial expression in my picture, the sun is quite bright!)

reviewText:
The Escalier jacket, provided by vendor at a serious discount as a 'for review' item, would have gotten a much higher rating had they refrained from deciding that the person who wears it really, really wants a patch with the word 'sh_t' and another that says 'msbhv'.

Seriously? Does everyone want to have 'sh_t' written on their jacket that, maybe, would like to wear it while at school? Well... our 13 yr. old, while she likes the jacket and the gentle fabric, does not agree with the patches at all and she's going to have them removed before actually wearing the jacket because it's embarrassing. First the patches are not original at all, they really aren't. In fact they look quite sad. Second, if one really wants to apply them on their jacket, let them express their own creativity.

These being said, the jacket is comfortable and it was a good fit. I suppose it's Okay once you remove those unoriginal, uninspired, added eyesores.
summary: Decent jacket if you take out the patches

reviewText:
This swimsuit is great! I was looking for something that would hide my belly but still be kind of sexy, and this was perfect. If you don't have one of these in your undergarment collection, you're going to want one.

I never knew how much I needed this in my life until now.  This product opens up some many more fashion options that I would have never had been comfortable with otherwise.

It doesn't lift and push up, quite as well in the pic, however it does hold them in place.  The sizing was pretty spot on and the instructions were easy to understand and follow.

The bra comes with a small resealable bag to store it in and I can definitely vouch that this works out well with travel as I've already taken it on a couple of trips.  It's not quite as comfortable as I had expected, but it's not uncomfortable either.

It definitely stayed up well with no problems!

I purchased this item at a reduced cost in exchange for my honest review.

Overall:  A New Wardrobe Staple!

This is actually the first time I have ever been able to wear something that doesn't have a back at all, but still wear a bra with it.  Very easy to put on.  All you have to do is put it in place and hook the front.  My options for purchasing different items of clothing has increased because of this.  The second most important requirement I have for a bra is comfort.  The material is very soft and comfortable.

Disclosure:  I purchased at a discount in exchange for an honest review, which I have given.  Like so many people, I depend on the honesty of other when purchasing an item.

reviewText:
Ive never had a bra like this. I honestly never knew they even had a bra like this. I always wondered what to do with the dresses or tops that have the back open. When I saw this I knew I had to try it and see if it would help. I love the bra. I love how it helps support. I was worried if it would stay up since it seemed like there was nothing to make it stay up, but it did. It was even a very hot day and it still stayed up. It was comfortable to wear. If youve never done one of these you might ask someone for help trying to position it to get it right. I wasn't sure where it needed to be. It is pretty sticky and even though it is sticky and didn't hurt to take it off. I was wondering if it would hurt like a bandaid.  It seems to be well made. I hope it will last awhile. Now that I know how it is I may buy a couple more.

I did receive this at a discounted price in return for my honest opinion. I do buy other things on amazon at full price and I look at these items the same way I do the others. Let's get this straight. This is like a typical drawstring bag. This is not something you would want to use as a back pack for school unless you are in like...kidnergarten. I do love the fact that they still did what a lot of drawstring bags do and made the straps what closes and opens the bag, regardless of it not being strings. I really like that. Also, don't be fooled by it's size. There is a zipper that, though at first unnoticed by me, when unzipped extends the bag. I really like that feature because then you can either have it huge or small depending on what you are putting in it. The pocket on the front is nice too. Again. Due to the straps I wouldn't put too much in these for fear of your shoulders, but if you want to divide stuff up a bit the front pocket is great to put things in that you need to have access to more readily. The bag is not fabric, it is more of a nylong type material. Lastly the clouds. I love them. They are perfect and look just like the ones on the robes. They also feel like they are really part of the bag, so I do not see them peeling or anything like that.

All in all it is a really fabulous bag and I can't wait to start wearing it around. I need to replace carrying my purse since I had my son. I tend to just throw things in his diaper bag because I didn't want to carry him, a diaper bag, and a purse. Having this as a purse would take out the carrying struggle factor of carrying a purse again. Though if you do want to carry it as a purse, it has handles on top to carry it as so :).  A great addition for any Naruto fan!

reviewText:
BABAN 32mm Watch Repair Tool Blue Metal Adjuster Watch Band Bracelet Strap Link Pin Remover

I recently purchased 12 new watches, 3 for me and 9 for all of my groomsmen in my wedding as their groomsmen gift!  So naturally they were going to need some links put in or taken out.  However, my old pin removal tool had gone missing and I was in deep need of a new one!

So once this one arrived I was really excited and ready to use it, however, once I looked at the pin pusher, it was a little crooked and not straight!  When you would screw in the screw the small pin pusher would be spinning all over the place because it was really off.  So after some minor bending of the tip back to a normal state it worked great!!!

You simply put your watch on top of this tool, crew the pusher until almost pushing your pin, (most watches have an arrow to indicate which way the pin goes) and the make sure you're aligned perfectly and screw about one full rotations and you will see the pin pop straight out!  Its self explanatory but works wonders!

Within 5 minutes I have all 9 groomsmen watches fitting them perfectly!  I recommend because its small and useful!!!

I was sent this product in exchange for me doing a review.  I have many of these kinds of tools.  Most of them are plastic or cheaply made metal and most of them are just about useless.  This is a one piece chunk of aluminum, milled out to give you what you see  It operates very smoothly and easily.  Most of these kinds of tools are for convenience.  These will remove the pins that would be easily removed in other ways.  This is not going to remove/replace every pin, nor is it going to remove pins that do not line up exactly with the tool.  Those will need block of wood and hammer/punch, or a very expensive bergeon tool designed to remove pins.

HOWEVER- if you have a new watch, like a seiko, invicta, or something similar, and need to remove a link or two, this will accomplish the job without damage to your watch band or watch

I would HIGHLY recommend this over those with the "bolt" at the end to adjust the height of the band.  They are useless because the part that pushes the pin out hits that "bolt" before it hits the pin.  Just use something like this---line up the pin--(and when you look at the band--you might see an arrow- that tells you the direction that the pin should be pushed out)===line it up, use something under it if necessary to raise it a little, and slowly turn the knob to move the tool into the pin.  If you encounter significant resistance, or the pin is not moving==do not continue.  Remove the band and see what the issue is, perhaps the tool is not lined up in the hole (where the pin is) or that pin is not designed to be pushed out--some are little screws---  So try it, and if it works, GREAT!!! It most likely will.  If it doesn't, take it to someone with more experience so you do not ruin your watchband or watch---or break the tool.

GOOD LUCK.  Just go slow, and make sure of what you are doing, and you should do just fine.  This is a very high quality, well made tool, and will work as well or better than anything similar to it.
summary: Very good quality, works exceptionally well.

It's beautiful!  The fabric is really soft and a nice rich tan colour.  It looks just like the photo ... having said which, when I initially ordered this it was only available to be shipped from China -- which meant a potentially long wait for the postal/customs systems.  About 10 days later I found it on Amazon again only now available for two-day Prime shipping (free shipping and returns)!  Being the impatient little brat that I am, I ordered a second one.  They both arrived on the same day!  Here's the thing, the one shipped from China has wider, flatter fringe, while the other one looks exactly like the photo with narrower fringe.  They are both beautiful, but I opted for the one sent from China with the wider fringe.  As far as fit, I am 5'0" and about 125-lbs, the Medium (as it turned out) is a perfect fit.  The size listed is:  Shoulder[Onesize: 14.17"], Bust[Onesize: 37.01"] and even though one was tagged with a Persun label, the one I kept is tagged with a Choies label (same company possibly).  This is my second purchase from Persun and I have been very happy with both transactions and items.  I machine-wash the items in a mesh bag on the delicate cycle and they've come out just fine.

reviewText:
So cute! This item came as it appears in the picture and as described by the seller and I was happy to see that it was as big as I had anticipated (it hangs from my collar bone to just above my bust). Each of the bone links feel sturdy and sections are connected by thick rings allowing movement and the skeleton to contour well. While the necklace isn't adjustable per se (it has a single larger ring at the back which the lobster clasp connects to), since the chain is made from links you could shorten it a little bit more without interfering with how the skeleton lays.

Cons:
- Keep in mind this item is an alloy and so has a slight metallic smell to it (kind of like old pennies or bronze candle sticks).
- Follow the care instructions the seller has on this page! I imagine it would get rather hot in direct sunlight and the antiquing is likely to be messed up by cleaning products.
- This ships internationally, so if you live in the States keep in mind it will take awhile to find you. I purchased this on April 17th and it was expected to be here May 9th, but I got it earlier on April 29th - in my experience that is very fast for postal service!

I received this item at a discount in return for an honest review.

This is one of my new favorite necklaces! It super cute and surprisingly comfortable to wear. I thought that the legs hanging off-center might bother me, but I barely noticed. I've worn this necklace several times since I've purchased it and every single time I get so many compliments. Although many people were unable to tell what the necklace was until they looked at it closer. It's great watching their faces light up when they realize it's a necklace of t-rex bones.
The necklace itself is quality made. It is not lightweight or flimsy feeling. The chain is sturdy and I have no concerns of it breaking. I also like that this necklace is adjustable so I can wear it long or short.
If you want a great conversation starter, or just to be the envy of your friends, this is the necklace for you!
summary: Great necklace, quality made, matches with most outfits

reviewText:
I ordered the bronze colored necklace and when I got it in the mail, it came with a nice black bag to keep it safe. When I took the necklace out of the bag, I noticed that the necklace was not assembled correctly. I decided that to be fair, I would contact the seller and give them a chance to fix the necklace. I emailed the seller,, and sent  in a picture. They apologized for the defective necklace and said that I could fix it myself and wear it or throw it away. Whatever I chose to do was ok with them, They asked which color of necklace I would like to have the replacement in, so I selected the black color. They also stated that  the replacement would take longer to be shipped as it would't  be shipped from Amazon. I appreciated the heads up.

I received the black one today, and I love it! The chain is sturdy, and the black is shiny and  fun to play with.  I thought that the skeleton would have been smaller, but  I was delightfully surprised at the size.

I would recommend this necklace to anyone!

I did receive a discount on this item in exchange for a fair and honest review.

I thought this was a fan type of necklace when I ordered it, but in fact, there are sections of the T-Rex skeleton, rather than individual bones, joined by jump rings.  If you look closely at the photo, you can see the sections:  head and upper neck, lower neck and shoulders/arms, top  portion of ribcage, lower ribcage and gut area, hips/legs, and then there are 5 tail pieces.  The metal that the skeleton is made from appears to be solid brass.  It is not the really shiny brass (think: gold wannabe), but a more muted one, although there is definitely shine to it.  The chain is either steel or plated steel, since it sticks to the magnet on the back of my phone.

On the clasp, there is a small disk dangling that says Jane on top and Stone on the bottom, and on the center of the back is a small crystal, that sparkles like a diamond (although I am sure it is not), which is a very nice effect.

The item name says that it is a choker, which made me nervous, because those often feel like they're actually trying to choke you.  This is actually a necklace.  It measures roughly 20-22 inches to the first jump ring, and 22-24 inches to the second jump ring, so the length depends on which one you select.  (Unfortunately, I don't have a tape measure, I used ceiling tiles to estimate a measurement).

I ordered this for my granddaughter, but I like it so much that I may order another for myself.

I purchased this necklace at a reduced price in exchange for writing an unbiased review of this product, which is what I have given.

This came before the expected date, packaged neatly and with no rips, frays, zipper problems, or other blemishes. Amazon said they'd cancel my order if it didn't ship in a certain amount of time, but most of the wait on the dress is its production, so I knew the long period before shipping was  to be expected. I emailed the vendor and asked if they could contact Amazon and ensure a valid transaction. They were very friendly and said it would come, and it did!

I'm 5'6", 130lbs, a 34B bra, and waist 27". I bought a size 4 and it couldn't have fit more perfectly! Both my parents were floored by how custom it looked! And the tulle wasn't too poofy or too long for me at all. No alterations needed there :)

This has a lower waistline than I expected, which I think looks a little frumpy, but my sisters say it looks fine. It's not a slimming dress, but a pretty shape nonetheless. The lace is very pretty and true to the photo, but very itchy. I'll definitely have to figure out a remedy for that before spending a night in it at prom - maybe a full lining of softer material. I ordered mine in pink, which is shown as a warm blush color, but mine was just a little more fuchsia. (Not nearly as much as the photos look, they don't do it justice. It really is close to the hue of the pink dress shown.) I love that the buttons on the back are fake so I can just zip it up, but upon opening the package, it didn't sit quite right and you can see the zipper underneath. May have to put a hook-and-eye on the back to close that up. As far as the neckline, the front of mine looked like the photo, but it didn't dip down in the back like that. The back was as high as the front on mine. But in the other photo reviews, it looks like one girl's came with a sweetheart neckline! So you have to be up for a bargain with the neckline and the back!

It's a gorgeous dress, EXACTLY my size, and I feel like a princess in it! For $65, it was definitely worth it. If this is near the top of your price range, I'd say go for it. If you can afford more, you can find a more flattering version of this dress. I know there are 3+ other Amazon vendors who sell the same dress at higher prices.

reviewText: So my 3yr old son decided he wanted to be Santa Claus... this was the perfect compliment to his costume.  It's a good size, and isn't scratchy.  He loves wearing it.

These will be perfect for my young grandsons; hats are plush and are on the smaller size. The free beard is child-sized and makes a great addition. Product as described - excellent service and follow-through.

If you have small children in your life this set is definitely something to have tucked away for Christmas. I have two year old twins and I think that this is going to be the first year where they have some sort of idea what Santa is about. I know that they'll have a lot of fun with this set over the years and I can't wait for them to be able to see it.

The set is really well made, especially for the price. You get both the Santa hat and the beard when you purchase this, so it's a great addition to a Santa costume, or just for dressing up around the holidays. The hat is plush and soft, and fits both myself and my husband. It looks just like what you would expect a traditional Santa hat to look like, with the fur lined brim and the white ball on the tip. The beard is a little scratchy, but that's honestly to be expected with something like that.

Overall, I would definitely recommend this to someone looking for a Santa hat and beard for the holidays. It's a great price and will be a lot of fun for the little ones in your lives.

I received my Plush Christmas Santa Claus Hat with Free Beard at no cost in return for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are my own and no further compensation was received.

reviewText:
Update: So here it is, 11 months later and I feel it's necessary to add to my original review (below). The wheels are working great and the handle hasn't come apart or pulled completely off of the bag (both of these areas seem to be an issue with many rolling bags). The zippers normally cooperate although they are starting to stick. The straps are still attached and in working order. Now for the not so good. The entire outer area fabric has frayed at the seams. It's literally falling apart. Same inside. The lining came apart about 6 months after purchase. Sad to see this happening, because this is a handy rolling bag that I use for the short trip from my car to my desk at work & back again at the end of the day. It's been extremely convenient to not have to carry multiple bags on my shoulders. If you use this item for an occasional trip out of town (like maybe 4 times a year) it should last you a good while, but it isn't hardy enough for a 5-day work week.

The wheels are fairly quiet which is nice when I'm rolling down the hallways at work. I took one star off because the bag tends to tip when going around tight corners, which then yanks on my arm & shoulder which causes pain where I have my injury. Takes some getting used to, but I'll eventually get the "turn radius" figured out and not have that problem in the future.

i like it a lot
Excellent quality of materials, very good finish and excellent packaging.

Marino Men's Genuine Leather Ratchet Dress Belt with Automatic Buckle, Enclosed in an Elegant Gift Box, Color: Gunblack Silver Striped Buckle with Black Leather

For me this is the first time I've had a ratcheting belt. It is always my luck that on a regular belt I use the same hole and that part starts to tear become weak and eventually break or becomes so thin I give up on it before it breaks at the worst time. This Marino belt is very nice in many areas, the ratcheting system being the most unique. Instead of a traditional latch system the leather has a tooth and notch system that slides through the buckle and holds on. You can adjust the belt in tiny increments by pulling it through until it feels tight enough. This is a great improvement over the traditional. Also there are no holes in the belt so it looks great, too. There are an assortment of buckles and colors to choose from, too.

So far in using it I have one complaint. I find it difficult to undo the latch on the buckle to open the belt. I keep fighting with it as I find it unnatural to release the latch. I haven't become used to the opening method yet. I push and pull in the wrong direction all the time. I know over time I'll get used to it but it is a confusing, to me, system. When I do get it right it releases just fine. I've never found myself trapped as I read in other reviews before I bought this. I thought that wouldn't happen to me. Well, it happens but not to the point I felt like cutting the belt off. So, I still like it over all. The quality is top notch and the packaging makes for a great gift. The inclusion of a key fob is a very nice touch, too. While not perfect, I do like this very much and would recommend giving one a try before committing to change all your belts.
summary: New style latching system makes for a unique experience, worth a try.

reviewText: Love this belt. The ratcheting system gives me a perfect fit through the many iterations of my waist size. My only concern is that it won't go through TSA precheck security like my traditional belt does. Sets off the detector every time.
